summary:
Tony: What time is it, 3 A.M., 4 A.M.?
Steve: It’s six.
Tony: A.M.?!
Steve: No.
Tony: Oh. Is dinner ready?
body:
Tony: What time is it, 3 A.M., 4 A.M.?

Steve: It’s six.

Tony: A.M.?!

Steve: No.

Tony: Oh. Is dinner ready?

summary: I've been running on one hour of sleep for like two days and I'm about to collapse but I just wanted to say that I love chris...
body: I’ve been running on one hour of sleep for like two days and I’m about to collapse but I just wanted to say that I love chris evans and he deserves the whole world and I hope he knows how much I appreciate everything he’s done/worked for/supported without cause. he’s a truly remarkable man and none will ever, ever be classed the same as him.

blog.name: cap-evanns
blog.description: Chris Evans and Sebastian Stan? 10/10. masterlist

summary: can you a one shot of chris and y/n on a rainy night in? it's currently down pouring by me and i wish that man was here
question: can you a one shot of chris and y/n on a rainy night in? it's currently down pouring by me and i wish that man was here
answer:
i love this idea! Hope you like it!

She sat on the couch in one of Chris’ t-shirts with a large blanket draped over her. She tilted her head back to rest on the couch and looked through the window to watch the rain fall. Y/N wish she could stay like this for the whole week. The rain has been downfalling all day, putting Y/N in a sleepy mood. As the day winded down all she wanted to do was cozy up next to Chris for the day.

“Want whip cream on your hot chocolate babe?” Chris’ voice echoed out to you from the kitchen. He was just as happy to spend the night inside with her after his hectic week with work. Chris loved to take care of her, and he knew how needy she was when the weather was gloomy like today. He was happy to stay in under the covers with Y/N by his side.

“Yes please!” Y/N clicked through the television channels to find something they could watch. Friends. Modern Family. How It’s Made. She kept clicking through aimlessly not being able to decide. Chris’ footsteps soon entered the living room and she sat reached out her hands from the blanket for her hot chocolate. “You’re an angel Chris.”

He chuckled and handed her the hot chocolate, then placed a kiss on her forehead. “Anything for my baby.”

Chris sat down next to her and sipped on his drink. He turned to her and shook his head, “Knowing you, we won’t pick something to watch for another hour.”

She opened her mouth and let out a laugh, “Chris! Shut up that’s not true…” she sighed and lowered her shoulders, “okay maybe it’s a little true. Here.” Y/N threw the remote onto his lap and went back to drinking her hot chocolate. Chris opened up Netflix and selected a new movie. “There we go.”

Finishing her hot chocolate she passed it to him to place on the table. As the movie started to play she layed down and rested her head on his lap. Everytime Chris laughed she felt his whole body shake, causing her to get butterflies in her stomach. His laugh warmed her whole body and could make her smile no matter her mood. He reached his hand up and started to lightly play with her hair. She let out a soft moan to encourage him to keep playing with her hair. Closing her eyes she felt his fingers intertwine in her hair, and his hand run up and down her arm.

“Y/N?” his whispered to her, not sure if she fell asleep on his lap.

“Mhm.” she mumbled in response, starting to fall into a light sleep.

‘I love you,“ he bent his head down and put his hand on her cheek to move her face to look at him. A smile swept his lips as he looked into her eyes.

“I love you more,” she grinned and gave him a quick peck on his nose.

Chris swept his hand across her cheek and pressed his lips against hers. The kiss was gentle, and filled with love. He let his lips linger on her for a moment before slowly pulling away. He pressed one more light kiss onto her lips and pulled back up.

Chris took her hand in his, intertwining their fingers. His thumb lightly rubbed against your hand. The rain tapping against the windows became louder and louder.

“Want to go lay in bed?” he smiled down at her.

“Yes please,” she started to sit up but Chris’ pushed her back down lightly. He got up letting her head rest on the couch, and then scooped his hands around her to lift her up. “I got you.” She nuzzled her head into his chest breathing in his scent. He pressed a kiss to her temple, “let’s go to bed.”
